Item.Text: Door Markers: Internal doorways
First Explosion: Roll dice, add Fire and Hot Spot markers, resolve an Explosion
Second Explosion: Roll until target space that is not on fire, add Fire and Hot Spot markers, resolve an Explosion
Third Explosion: Flip over black die, roll red die until target space that is not on fire, add Fire and Hot Spot markers, resolve an Explosion
Fourth Explosion: Roll until target space that is not on fire, add Fire and Hot Spot markers, resolve an Explosion
Hazmats: Roll to place ${Difficulty} markers, re-roll if target space is on fire
POI Markers: Create a pool of 10 Victims and 5 False Alarms, roll to place 3, re-roll if target space is on fire
Difficulty Hotspots: Add 3 additional Hot Spots
Firefighters Hotspots: Add ${Players} additional Hot Spots
Hot Spot Reserve: Place ${Difficulty} on the board as reserve
Firefighters are placed on any space outside the house
Ambulance and Fire Engine are place on a space chosen by the group
Players decide who goes first, otherwise youngest player
A Lone Engine Company: Your volunteer firefighter crew has to respond quickly with the limited resources on hand. Randomly select Specialist cards, Crew Change action is not available
Unmarked Hazards: You never know what lies beneath the ? mark. No Hazmat markers during inital setup, each False Alarm places a Hazmat token
Murphy Strikes: A broken water main hampers strctural firefighting. The Deck Gun action is not available

Overtaking an Arsonist: This fire wasn't an accident, you will need to collect the evidence to catch the perp. Place 6 Hazmats during initial setup, at Rescue at least 7 Victims and Retrieve 3 Hazmat markers to win
The Original Hero: Think you are hot stuff? Try winning the Heroic level as it was first envisioned. Please 3 more Hot Spots during initial setup, please all remaining Hot Spots into the reserve

A Friend in Need: Get Knocked Down and your Fellow Firefighters must get you back to the Ambulance. A Knocked Down Firefighter cannot take any Actions until they have been Treated by the Medic or Carried to the Ambulance. They count as a Victim for other Firefighters to carry them
A Hotter Spot: It's not just an extra Advanced Fire Roll. When the Target space of the Advanced Fire roll contains a Hot Spot, please a Fire marker instead of just Smoke

Save the Structure: An abandoned building, your crew is instructed to use a defensive approach. No POI, No Hazmats, place 18 Hot Spots during initial setup, Flare-Ups do not add a Hot Spot, cleared Hot Spots do not re-enter play, victory with all Hot Spots cleared, loss if Building Collapses, or a Firefighter is Downed
